heroSection.heading: Be prepared for upcoming reanimations
heroSection.subheading: Stay safe and sound on Z-Day
heroSection.description: Learn how to survive and thrive during a zombie apocalypse with our essential tips and resources.

graphicListItems.title: Gather Supplies
graphicListItems.body: Stock up on water, food, and first aid supplies. Ensure you have enough to last several days without access to additional resources.

graphicListItems.title: Secure Your Home
graphicListItems.body: Ensure your living space is fortified against the reanimated. Check all entries and exits, and reinforce doors and windows.

graphicListItems.title: Form a Plan
graphicListItems.body: Plan your evacuation and safety measures with family. Identify local shelters and multiple escape routes from your area.

graphicListItems.title: Stay Informed
graphicListItems.body: Keep up-to-date with the latest zombie alerts and safety tips. Follow local news and emergency broadcasts regularly.

finalSection.heading: Act Now Before It's Too Late!
finalSection.content: Don't wait for the zombie apocalypse to catch you off guard. Prepare today and ensure your safety and survival. Connect with local zombie preparedness organizations and participate in community drills.
